video.title: The Super Hero Squad Show
video.synopsis: Iron Man, Wolverine, the Hulk, Silver Surfer, Thor and the Falcon -- the Super Hero Squad -- protect Super Hero City from the baddies of VillainVille.

episodes.synopsis: The Squad has a big mission to keep a fractal from Dr. Doom. Falcon is eager to show he's no rookie, but his teammates underestimate him.
episodes.title: And Lo, a Pilot Shall Come!

episodes.synopsis: Teen Hispanic hero Reptil joins the Squad as a trainee with Wolverine as his mentor. On their first mission, hotshot Reptil gets himself in hot water.
episodes.title: To Err Is Superhuman!

episodes.synopsis: Silver Surfer can't get the hang of Earth customs, which frustrates his Squad buddies. So the Surfer heads out on his own, and Dr. Doom captures him.
episodes.title: This Silver, This Surfer!

episodes.synopsis: During a battle with Klaw and Screaming Mimi, the Hulk is turned into the Gray Hulk. The Squad chase down the Lethal Legion to save Super Hero City.
episodes.title: Hulk Talk Smack!

episodes.synopsis: Supernatural wackiness is turning the city upside-down. The Squad goes to Dr. Strange for help, but he tricks them into battling the dread Dormammu.
episodes.title: Enter: Dormammu!

episodes.synopsis: When a bratty 3-year-old girl wears a fractal tiara, she gains terrifying power that creates mayhem for heroes and villains alike.
episodes.title: A Brat Walks Among Us!

episodes.synopsis: Loki's scheming sends the Squad into Villainsville and Asgard. But silly sibling rivalry with Thor threatens to destroy both Asgard and Midgard.
episodes.title: Oh Brother!

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious new villain, Scorpio, allies himself with Doom. Soon enough, he's leading the villains in a quest to steal Stark's most powerful tech.
episodes.title: From the Atom...It Rises!

episodes.synopsis: When the Helicarrier gets smashed, the Squad needs to find a place to crash. Only Dr. Strange will take them in, which they're none too happy about.
episodes.title: Night in the Sanctorum

episodes.synopsis: Doom's ally Egghead hatches a scheme to steal a fractal in the Squad's Helicarrier by shrinking to insect size. Ant-Man helps chase down the villains.
episodes.title: This Forest Green

episodes.synopsis: For a lone wolf like Wolverine, close quarters with the Squad isn't comfortable, so he gets himself drafted into the international All-Captains Squad.
episodes.title: O, Captain, My Captain

episodes.synopsis: The Squad helps out the Fantastic Four with an ambush from the alien Skrulls. Meanwhile, Dr. Doom is making a devious deal with cosmic villain Thanos.
episodes.title: If This Be My Thanos!

episodes.synopsis: A new heroine named the Black Widow joins the team and shows the boys she can fight even better than them -- but she harbors a treacherous secret.
episodes.title: Deadly Is the Black Widow's Bite!

episodes.synopsis: A fractal mishap finally gives M.O.D.O.K. his big chance to overthrow Dr. Doom.
episodes.title: Tremble at the Might of...M.O.D.O.K!

episodes.synopsis: The devious Enchantress plots to make Thor fall in love with her, to the fury of the jealous Skurge. But her love spell goes awry.
episodes.title: Mental Organism Designed Only for Kisses!

episodes.synopsis: Sinister Baron Mordo escapes the Dark Dimension and possesses Iron Man, turning him into "Iron Menace."
episodes.title: Invader from the Dark Dimension!

episodes.synopsis: Doom has a scheme to destroy Iron Man. Fortunately, Iron Man's best pal, James Rhodes, armors up to help.
episodes.title: Tales of Suspense!

episodes.synopsis: When a sabertooth cat arrives in Super Hero City, a mysterious jungle lord comes to find him. But the Lethal Legion has its own plan for the cat.
episodes.title: Stranger from a Savage Land!

episodes.synopsis: Cap learns that Wolverine never got his diploma and sends him back to the Xavier School to get his remaining credits.
episodes.title: Mysterious Mayhem at Mutant High!

episodes.synopsis: Wolverine and the Mayor are up against heroes and villains alike when the entire city falls prey to Egghead's mind control.
episodes.title: Election of Evil!

episodes.synopsis: A new villain is in town ... Magneto! And he has tricked his own kids into a sinister plot to steal the Vault's fractals for Dr. Doom.
episodes.title: Hexed, Vexed and Perplexed!

episodes.synopsis: Doom sends out his "Team Toxic" -- Pyro, Paste Pot Pete and Zzzax -- to melt the polar icecaps.
episodes.title: The Ice Melt Cometh!

episodes.synopsis: To show his minions what real villainy looks like, Doom thaws out the infamous World War II menace, the Red Skull.
episodes.title: Wrath of the Red Skull!

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Doom conquers Chthon's mystical dimension to free his mother, Coco Von Doom.
episodes.title: Mother of Doom!

episodes.synopsis: Silver Surfer's past as Galactus's herald is revealed as he encounters another herald, Stardust. But Doom has plans of his own for Stardust.
episodes.title: Last Exit Before Doomsday!

episodes.synopsis: In one last bid to defeat Galactus and to save Earth and Super Hero City, the Squad assembles the Infinity Sword.
episodes.title: This Al Dente Earth!

episodes.synopsis: Doom sends the Squaddies on a wild goose chase, leaving Cap and Ms. Marvel alone to stop Doom, M.O.D.O.K. and Abomination from breaking out of jail.
episodes.title: Another Order of Evil: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When one of the Squad's archvillains plots to take over Olympus and Asgard, can Thor and Hercules put aside their pride to save the day?
episodes.title: Another Order of Evil: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Thanos uses the Time Stone to send the Scarlet Witch back to World War II, where she's caught up in a battle between the Red Skull and the Invaders!
episodes.title: World War Witch!

episodes.synopsis: An unlikely ally hidden aboard the Helicarrier must rescue the captured Squaddies. Plus, Thanos reveals that he's behind the Kree-Skrull conflict!
episodes.title: Villany Redux Syndrome

episodes.synopsis: The Super Hero Squad must reunite to stop a war between the Kree and Skrull galactic empires.
episodes.title: Support Your Local Sky Father

episodes.synopsis: To win the Mind Stone, Thanos sets the Squaddies against the Squadron Supreme, a team of heroes from another universe!
episodes.title: Whom Continuity Would Destroy!

episodes.synopsis: Nebula's fight with Thanos over the Space Stone sends Wolverine and HERBIE into the Negative Zone.
episodes.title: Double Negation at the World's End!

episodes.synopsis: Galactus aims to destroy the Skrull throneworld. The Silver Surfer's nowhere in sight, so the Squaddies must face the Devourer of Worlds on their own.
episodes.title: Alienating with the Surfer!

episodes.synopsis: When Thanos uses the Mind Stone to send Hulk on a sleepwalking rampage, the Squaddies must enter a dream world to fight back.
episodes.title: Blind Rage Knows No Color!

episodes.synopsis: When the Enchantress tricks Odin into marriage, Thor must take his father's place on the throne of Asgard!
episodes.title: Lo, How the Mighty Hath Abdicated!

episodes.synopsis: Iron Man must keep Thanos from using the Power Stone to destroy intergalactic peacekeepers the Nova Corps.
episodes.title: So Pretty When They Explode!

episodes.synopsis: Reptil and Wolverine must chase down Egghead's army of escaped Wolverine clones. But another teen hero, Firestar, may be more hindrance than help!
episodes.title: Too Many Wolverines!

episodes.synopsis: Doctor Doom discovers that his mother, the calamitous Coco Von Doom, has turned his Latverian Castle into a day spa for heroes!
episodes.title: Pedicure and Facial of Doom!

episodes.synopsis: As power-mad Thanos gets all the Infinity Stones, the Squaddies face betrayal at the hands of one of their own!
episodes.title: Fate of Destiny!

episodes.synopsis: After being thrown into another dimension by the Dark Surfer, Thor befriends a Korbinite janitor named Beta Ray Bill.
episodes.title: The Saga of Beta Ray Bill! (Six Against Infinity: Part 1)

episodes.synopsis: After being thrown into another dimension by the Dark Surfer, Falcon finds himself in a dark future.
episodes.title: Days, Nights, and Weekends of Future Past! (Six Against Infinity: Part 2)

episodes.synopsis: After being thrown into another dimension by the Dark Surfer, Iron Man finds himself lost in a gloomy universe of matinee monsters.
episodes.title: This Man-Thing, This Monster! (Six Against Infinity: Part 3)

episodes.synopsis: After being thrown into another dimension by the Dark Surfer, Wolverine discovers himself in Dinosaur World.
episodes.title: The Devil Dinosaur You Say! (Six Against Infinity: Part 4)

episodes.synopsis: After being thrown into another dimension by the Dark Surfer, Hulk arrives on the war-torn planet Sakaar.
episodes.title: Planet Hulk! (Six Against Infinity: Part 5)

episodes.synopsis: Thrown into another dimension by the Dark Surfer, Scarlet Witch wakes up in the New World in the year 1602 and is imprisoned by the local townsfolk.
episodes.title: 1602! (Six Against Infinity: Part 6)

episodes.synopsis: As Mr. Fantastic and Ms. Marvel try to rescue the Squaddies from their extra-dimensional exile, the evil Hydra besieges the heroes' distant outpost.
episodes.title: Brouhaha at the World's Bottom!

episodes.synopsis: Having problems at home, the Impossible Man ends up crashing with the Super Hero Squad.
episodes.title: Missing: Impossible!

episodes.synopsis: Attempting to go back in time to stop the Dark Surfer, the Super Hero Squad suffers a time mishap that transforms several of the Squaddies into kids.
episodes.title: Revenge of the Baby Sat!

episodes.synopsis: Ms. Marvel leads the Squaddies on a mission to rescue her namesake, Captain Marvel, from the Dark Surfer.
episodes.title: Soul Stone Picnic!

episodes.synopsis: As the Dark Surfer prepares to end the universe, the half-frozen Super Hero Squad mounts a last, desperate attack.
episodes.title: When Strikes the Surfer!

episodes.synopsis: The Six Squaddies must each face the Dark Surfer one-on-one in a final battle for the fate of reality that takes them to the edge of the universe.
episodes.title: The Final Battle! ('Nuff Said!)
